a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of students achieving intermediate learning outcomes, 1970 to
Proportion of students achieving an intermediate proficiency benchmark. Achievement outcomes come from standardized,
psychometrically-robust international and regional tests. In order to maximize coverage by country, tests have been
harmonized and pooled across subjects (math, reading, science) and levels (primary and secondary education). See source
Data source: Altinok, Angrist, and Patrinos (2018)
